H0.text: The name of which Chinese dish translates as 'bits and pieces'. Chop Suey

H1.text: The name of which Chinese dish translates as 'bits and pieces'. Wonton Soup

H2.text: The name of which Chinese dish translates as 'bits and pieces'. Lo Mein

H3.text: The name of which Chinese dish translates as 'bits and pieces'. Zasui

A4.text: za sui (杂碎) is found in newer Chinese-English dictionaries with both meanings listed: cooked entrails, and chop suey in the Western sense.
